item.title: Dragon full helm
item.dc:creator: @sorrowlegacy sorrowlegacy
item.description:
@sorrowlegacy wrote:

You want to know how to create dragon helmet in your server?
You can use the system ‘‘item on another item’’.I learned this from lost! i think.
First of all,choose wiche item youll put together so it will make a helmet.
Then,search for ‘’ case 53 ‘’ (or ‘’ item on another item ‘’)
It will bring you to something like this

case 53:// Use Item on another Item

go down a little until you find something like this

println_debug("Item: “+useWith+” used with item: "+itemUsed);
println_debug("usedwithslot: “+usedWithSlot+” itemusedslot: “+itemUsedSlot+” usewith: “+useWith+” p4: “+p4+” itemused: “+itemUsed+” p6: "+p6);

under that paste that

}
if((itemUsed == #1 && useWith == #2)) {
deleteItem(#1, getItemSlot(#1), 1);
deleteItem(#2, getItemSlot(#2), 1);
addSkillXP((#4*playerLevel[#3]), #3);
addItem(#5, #6);
sendMessage(“text1”);

replace #1 and #2 by the items youll use to make a helmet.
if you dont want to delete the two item you used to make the helmet,remove one of the delete item line

in delete item line will be the item youll lose

if you dont want to get exp making the helmet,remove the addskill line.Else, replace #4 by the exp youll receive.the #3 is the id of the skill.

0=attack
1=defence
2=strengh
3=hitpoint
4=range
5=prayer
6=mage
7=cooking
8=woodcutting
9=fletching
10=fishing
11=firemaking
12=crafting
13=smithing
14=mining
15=herblore
16=agility
17=theiving
18=slayer
19=farming
20=runecrafting

these are the id of each skill.

on the additem line,the #5 is the id of the item,and the #6 is how much
for you,the #5 would be 1149 , the id of the dragon med helm.

finally,on the send message line, change text1 by the text you want to be appear in the chatbox.

like,if you wanted to make a dragon med helm with a hammer and a ruby,it would be

}
if((itemUsed == 2347 && useWith == 1603)) {
deleteItem(1603, getItemSlot(1603), 1);
addSkillXP((3*playerLevel[12]), 12);
addItem(1149, 1);
sendMessage(“You made a dragon med helm by hitting on the ruby.”);

thats what would happen with this code.

if you use the hammer with the ruby,the ruby changes into a dragon helm.You keep the hammer.You get some crafting exp and a message in the chat box appear (You made a dragon med helm by hitting on the ruby.)

first time i helped someone,i hope its useful to you
if you dont understand something,tell me

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon full helm
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

Get a client, and equip it with the latest cache that Jagex is up to. Not the latest cache available, but the latest cache. Dragon full helms are a new update of Jagex’s.

Read full topic
